name: Digital Gift Card
description: Not sure what to choose? Our digital gift card is the perfect option. Delivered straight to their inbox, it lets them shop their favourite pieces whenever they like — for birthdays, thank yous or just because. Available in values from £10 to £200 Delivered to the recipient’s inbox for immediate gifting Redeemable online only Expires after one year, giving them plenty of time to choose what they love Edits after purchasing will not be possible, so please double check the recipient's details For further information, please see the FAQs.

name: Black Floral Frill Sleeve Martha Midi Dress
description: Feeling floral. Black with white blooms and hints of green, this easy midi dress has a v-neck, fluttery sleeves and flows with ease. Day to night, she’s your dress.

name: Pink Frill Sleeve Layla Midi Dress
description: This deep pink midi dress features a V-neckline and short ruffle sleeves. Underbust seams shape before falling to a relaxed silhouette.

name: White Floral Starlight Midi Dress
description: Our iconic style: Starlight. Coming in white with NC florals, this puff sleeve midi dress features button front detailing that falls to a flowy, A-line shape. She's even got pockets.

name: Cream Ditsy Floral Saffy Midi Dress
description: A pretty dress with all the trimmings. Elevated with lace, pleats, and covered buttons, this cream midi dress pulls you in with its feminine, floral print. Its panelled waist falls into a floaty skirt with a front slit.

name: Abstract Floral Bandeau Felicity Midi Dress
description: Meet Felicity, the midi that flatters everyone. Coming in a vintage-inspired print, this bandeau dress features a pleated bodice that flares out into a full skirt with pockets.

name: Green Polka Dot Adrian Midi Dress
description: Totally obsessed. Coming in a green polka dot print, our Adrian dress is designed with thick straps and sweet shoulder tie fastenings. Style yours with sandals, everywhere you go.

name: Black Colorado Midi Dress
description: The everyday dress: Colorado. Made from contrasting fabrics, our black midi dress features a soft, fitted top and flows to a light, airy skirt. We love the bra-friendly straps and side pockets.

name: Black Short Sleeve A-line Sarah Midi Dress
description: Coming in classic black, we love the crew neck that’s balanced by an open scoop back. Plus the close fitting top that falls into a relaxed swishy skirt is a winner for every occasion.

name: Red Bandeau Felicity Midi Dress
description: Meet Felicity, the midi that flatters everyone. Coming in red, this bandeau dress features a pleated bodice that flares out into a full skirt with pockets.

Men's Everyday Boxer Briefs
description: Comfortable elastic waistband that won't dig or slip. Double-layered pouch for gentle yet secure support. Lightweight design that won't ride up. Form fitting with plenty of room to stretch. Minimal silhouette for unrestricted comfort. Please note that this product has recently undergone a name change and was formerly known as the Men's Everyday Boxers.

name: Sport Ankle Socks
description: Introducing Boody's Sport Ankle Bamboo Socks in Black for Men & Women. Made comfy with Viscose fibre made from organically grown Bamboo. Arch compression for added support. No irritating toe seam for ultimate comfort. Breathable mesh panel wicks away moisture. Ankle tab keeps the sock up and creates a barrier against rubbing shoes. Comfortable yet tighter fit to reduce friction at your pressure points. Reinforced toe and heel for durability and longevity. Please note that our socks have recently undergone a name change. This is to better reflect their fit.
